condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Number of key measures in place that set and monitor progress towards numeric targets for women's leadership Public sector
Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: Administrative reporting systems
Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: Conventional data collection methods (e.g. surveys)
Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development
Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: Other international agreements
Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: Paris Agreement
Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At national level
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Platforms for raising awareness and social mobilisation
Country has improved capacities for dialogue, consensus-building and reconciliation around contested issues, with equal participation of women and men
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Health shocks (e.g. pandemics)
Country has operational end-to-end multi-sectoral early warning systems (EWS) to limit the gender-differentiated impact of: Natural hazards
Country has requested the application of tools such as the UNDG conflict and development analysis (CDAs) to inform planning and programming in key sectors
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Budgets
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Development plans and strategies
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Private sector business plans and strategies
National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
Parliament has improved capacities to undertake inclusive, effective and accountable law-making
